name: Cycle of Evil
description:
Every 100 years Evil arises...

It is up to you to defeat evil... every... single.... time... 

Randomly generated heroes will be under your control, and you will have to face two villains who are trying to destroy the world. 

(There is also a desktop version which has better graphics than the browser version. Sorry if the HTML version is bad, It's my first time exporting to HTML and I don't know how to optimize for html)
